data.title: Plant a tree, so that the next generation can get air for free
data.description: More trees would mean that fewer people would have to spend money on oxygen

data.title: Trees make the environment cleaner and provide us with oxygen.
data.description: If you cut a tree, you kill a life. If you save a tree, you save a life. If you plant a tree, you plant a life.

data.title: Don’t make trees rare, keep them with care.
data.description: It’s imperative that we conserve trees so that our lives aren’t adversely affected.

data.title: Take care of the trees, they will take care of you.
data.description: Nature is all about give and take, and we reap what we sow
